commit.message:
Merge #1377

1377: Use inline snapshots in complete_keyword r=matklad a=sbihel

Relates to #1127

Co-authored-by: Simon Bihel <simon.bihel@ens-rennes.fr>

files.patch:
@@ -109,159 +109,640 @@ fn complete_return(
